module.name: LibraryViewer/LibraryViewer
module.description: Displays information about items on a catalog.

method.name: getResource
method.description: Displays information about a given resource. The resource to display is identified by a single argument with the format: catalogIndex/resourceType/resourceID

method.name: getCatalogResources
method.description: Displays a dropdown control with all resources in a catalog. Selecting a resource from this list calls the getResourceMethod, Use the catalogIndex as a parameter.
